findings.title: Vulnerability: Possible unreachable view function
findings.description: Using nested for-loops on an unpredictable amount of iterations may cause great gas usage and make view-functions inaccessible

findings.title: Vulnerability: Multiple access to state variable
findings.description: Putting the state variable in the condition block of the `for` operator leads to continuous calls to this state variable for checking the condition which increases gas usage.

findings.title: Vulnerability: Boolean equality
findings.description: Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false.
